title: Ghost of Tsushima Standalone Expansion?! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 06.24.21
description:
Rumors are that you're getting more Ghost of Tsushima soon, Mario Golf: Super Rush reviews are in, and Phil Spencer's talking Halo Infinite! IGN's Daemon Hatfield joins Greg to talk about it all. 

﻿Follow Daemon: https://twitter.com/DaemZero 

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:03:50 - Housekeeping
Our Mario Golf: Super Rush Review is up as a Kinda Funny Gamescast! Check it out on youtube.com/kidnafunnygames and podcast services. It’s even got special guest Simon Cardy!
GaymerX Charity stream tomorrow - watch me destroy Andy!
We’re all seeing Fast 9 tonight -- In Review tomorrow!
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Donavan Harkness & Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:05:13 - Ghost of Tsushima Standalone Expansion? Francesco De Meo @ WCCF tech
00:11:12 - Mario Golf: Super Rush Review Round-Up
00:19:45 - Phil Spencer SPEAKS
00:26:00 - Killer Instinct’s Return, Darryn Bonthuys @ GameSpot
00:29:50 - Pokemon Go Removing Pandemic Features, Michael McWhertor @ Polygon
00:32:40 - Was this surprising for you guys as well? And is there any chance they get enough complaints to reconsider? - Best Friends Q: Dean
00:37:00 -  Ad
00:43:15-  Marvel’s Avengers Roadmap Update
00:45:40 - Out today
00:55:03 - Squad Up:(RyanXbox / PC) - JaMa7198
00:57:07 - GAMER CONFESSION
00:58:09 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg and Tim
